timeline.message: QACI-451 Added dependencies, missing in JDK11

QACI-451 Fixed jaxws-tracing compilation and deployment issues

- fixed crash on JDK11
- fixed weird exception on JDK8 related to Unstable
- separated test and deployment module packages as they use different
  compiler output paths

QACI-451 Added Unstable to a basic webarchive

- junit classes are added by Arquillian, but our extensions not.

QACI-451 Added error message to assertions, FixMethodOrder and logging

- the FixMethodOrder was replaced in recent commit by mistake
- log test start and end

timeline.bodyText: Missing Unstable caused errors on JDK8, which were different than failures on JDK11
timeline.author: dmatej
